      • Move

        public static java.lang.Boolean Move(char M)
        This subroutine is used for player movement.
        参数:
        M - the player's input, if valid it will change current CurrentCoordinate
        返回:
        return true, if the movement is valid; otherwise, false

      • CheckPosition

        public static java.lang.Boolean CheckPosition(java.lang.String[] input)
        This method is used to check whether current building type matches one of those inputed by the array
        参数:
        CurrentBtype - A String that contains the building type of Reznov's current position.
        返回:
        A boolean that will be used in an if conditional to judge whether following codes will be executed

      • CheckStatus

        public static java.lang.Boolean CheckStatus(java.lang.String[] input)
        This method is used to check whether current building status matches one of those inputed by the array
        参数:
        CurrentBstatus - A String that contains the building status of Reznov's current position.
        返回:
        A boolean that will be used in an if conditional to judge whether following codes will be executed

      • PrintAction

        public static int[] PrintAction()
        This method will print out all actions available at Reznov's current position.
        返回:
        Return an array of available choice No.

      • CheckAvailable

        public static java.lang.Boolean CheckAvailable(int decision,
                                               int[] PossibleDecision)
        This method will check whether the No. input by players is among those available choices.
        参数:
        decision - Choice made by Players.
        PossibleDecision - The integer array produced by PrintAction().
        返回:
        A Boolean value of true or false.

      • Teleport

        public static void Teleport()
        This method is used when Reznov is inside a sewer and tries to go to another sewer entrance.
        参数:
        SewerCoordinate - It stores coordinates of Sewer entrance in the map.(Y,X)
        input - No. of the row in SewerCoordinate that the player want to teleport to.
        o - No. of the row in SewerCoordinate that Reznov is currently at.

        public static void End()

      • windays

        public static java.lang.Boolean windays()
        the first condition to win: if Reznov could survive 60 days, then win
        参数:
        day - surviving days of Reznov
        返回:
        true if surviving days equal 60

      • winout

        public static java.lang.Boolean winout()
        the second condition to win: escaping from the city (i.e. arriving (10,14))
        参数:
        CurrentCoordinate - the position of the player
        返回:
        true if the player escapes from the city

      • win

        public static java.lang.Boolean win()
        use the 2 conditions above to determine whether the user has won windays: method to show whether Reznov has survived 60 days winout: method to show whether Reznov has escaped
        返回:
        true if at least one of the 2 conditions is satisfied, meaning Reznov(and players) has won

      • PositionReport

        public static void PositionReport()
        This method is used to tell players where is Reznov now and what is the building&status of his position

      • PositionStatusReport

        public static java.lang.String PositionStatusReport(char input)
        This method will get the building status of current coordinate.
        返回:
        return a string that can be used in PositionReport to out print.

      • Introduction

        public static void Introduction()
        Introduce this game to player.

      • Delay

        public static void Delay()
        Delay the program for 2s, make the program show texts slowly.

      • PlayerStatus

        public static void PlayerStatus()
        This method presents Reznov's current status.
        参数:
        sick - A Boolean value that shows whether Reznov is sick or not.
        injured - A Boolean value that shows whether Reznov is injured or not.
        pistol - A Boolean value that shows whether Reznov has a pistol or not.
        AutomaticRifle - A Boolean value that shows whether Reznov has an AR or not.
        FastRecover - A Boolean value that shows whether Reznov bandaged himselves or not.
        food - An int type data that shows how many units of food Reznov has now.
        medicine - An int type data that shows how many units of medicine Reznov has now.
        bandage - An int type data that shows how many units of bandages Reznov has now.
        ammo - An int type data that shows how many units of ammo Reznov has now.
        valuables - An int type data that shows how many units of valuables Reznov has now.
        spyID - A Boolean value that shows whether Reznov has a spy ID or not.
        Cipher - A Boolean value that shows whether Reznov has a cipher or not.
        Badge - A Boolean value that shows whether Reznov has a badge or not.

      • PlayerItemStatus

        public static void PlayerItemStatus()
        This method is used in Trade(), to print out item owned by Reznov now.
        参数:
        pistol - A Boolean value that shows whether Reznov has a pistol or not.
        AutomaticRifle - A Boolean value that shows whether Reznov has an AR or not.
        food - An int type data that shows how many units of food Reznov has now.
        medicine - An int type data that shows how many units of medicine Reznov has now.
        bandage - An int type data that shows how many units of bandages Reznov has now.
        ammo - An int type data that shows how many units of ammo Reznov has now.
        valuables - An int type data that shows how many units of valuables Reznov has now.

      • LongDelay

        public static void LongDelay()
        Delay the program for 6.5s, make the program show texts slowly.

      • Defeat

        public static void Defeat()
        This method is used to check whether player lose the game.
        参数:
        hp - hp is health point of Reznov.
        hungry - Hungry is rate of hunger.
        sick - Sick is a boolean type value that shows whether Reznov is sick.
        injured - Injured is a boolean type value that shows whether Reznov is injured.

      • RollDice

        public static int RollDice()
        This method will generate a random number[1,16] in order to decide fate of Reznov (what results will happen) when the player make a choice. The higher the number generated is, the better the result.
        返回:
        Return the randomly generated integer.

      • AffectRollDice

        public static int AffectRollDice(int input)
        This method is used to change result of RollDice() For example, if Reznov choose to scavange in an appartment, he can find one unit of medicine when the RollDice() result is bigger than 10. But in a hospital, of course he will have a bigger chance. Then, AffectRollDice(3) will add 3 to result of RollDice(). If he is in a wreckage, then it will be AffectRollDice(-3) because it is much harder to find medicine in wreckages.
        参数:
        input - An integer(can be either positive or negative) that influence the result and change the possiblity.
        返回:
        Return an integer than have been affected.
